law.catch_line: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, an individual who holds a reciprocal license may assign i...

text.section: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, an individual who holds a reciprocal license may assign it to a person who engages in the business of providing electrical services if the individual is employed principally by the person.
An individual may reassign the reciprocal license of the individual once in a fiscal year.
